TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExpressionContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种在序列化程序之间传递上下文状态的方法。

span.span: Provides a means of passing context state among serializers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 放置在上下文堆栈上，包含序列化期间最相关的表达式。An is placed on the context stack and contains the most relevant expression during serialization. 下面的 C# 代码演示赋值。The following C# code demonstrates an assignment. ```csharp button1.Text = "Hello"; ``` 序列化期间，多个序列化程序负责创建这一条语句。During serialization, several serializers are responsible for creating this single statement. 这些序列化程序之一是负责创建"Hello"。One of those serializers is responsible for creating "Hello". 有该序列化程序可能需要知道它在其中创建它的表达式的上下文的场合。There are times when that serializer may need to know the context in which it is creating its expression. 在前面的示例中，不需要此上下文。In the previous example, this context is not needed. 下面的 C# 代码演示在该环境的知识是必要的情况。The following C# code shows a situation in which knowledge of the context is necessary. ```csharp button1.Text = rm.GetString("button1_Text"); ``` 在这种情况下，负责创建资源表达式序列化程序需要通知的目标对象的名称。In this case, the serializer responsible for creating the resource expression needs to be informed of the names of the target objects. 类可以用于此。The class can be used for this. 在每个序列化程序创建的表达式和调用序列化程序来处理作为一个整体的语句的较小部分时，序列化程序上下文在堆栈上推送表达式上下文。As each serializer creates an expression and invokes a serializer to handle a smaller part of the statement as a whole, the serializer pushes an expression context on the context stack. 每个表达式上下文都具有一个父属性，在堆栈上查找下一步的表达式上下文。Each expression context has a parent property that locates the next expression context on the stack. 这提供了一种可方便遍历功能。This provides a convenient traversal capability.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用以确定将分配给该表达式时，是否需要强制转换。You can use to determine if a cast is needed when assigning to the expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果表达式是对的属性引用实例的属性调用`button1`，返回`button1`。If the expression is a property reference to the property of an instance of called `button1`, returns `button1`.
